snippet.title: MicroFactory [Devlog Showcase] - Conveyor Belts
snippet.description:
MicroFactory is a factory tycoon indie game made in unity where you can create all sort of unique electronic product such as Motherboards, CPU's, GPU's, Smartphones, Laptops, Smartwatches, etc.

Gather resources, build your factory, design electronic products and assemble them.
Compete against other companies, make the best product in the market.
Upgrade your factory with the products you make! Better CPU's gives more speed in your machines.
Sign contracts with other companies to receive or send a constant amount of resources every day.
Make presentations to improve the hype of your product.

Join our chat server on Discord: https://discord.gg/acmPyqQ
Stay tuned to the development on Twitter: https://twitter.com/SoloCaravel
Download the game on Gamejolt: https://solocaravel.gamejolt.io/MicroFactory

#microfactory #indiegame #gamedev​ #indiedev #unity3d​ #madewithunity #unity​ #devlog​
